{"step_by_step_thinking": "The document [0] provides a detailed explanation of a trial conducted to assess the efficacy and safety of nerinetide in human ischaemia-reperfusion that occurs with rapid endovascular thrombectomy in patients who had an acute ischaemic stroke.
